summary: 1. IGNITION SWITCH WOULD SOMETIMES NOT WORK. 2. IF TRAVELING ON HIGHWAY AND DOWNSHIFTED, VIBRATION WOULD KILL IGNITION SWITCH AND ENGINE WOULD DIE AND CARS BEHIND YOU CAME UP FAST AS THE BIKE WAS SLOWING DOWN. VERY UNSAFE...JIGGLED KEY AND ENGINE STARTED BACK UP.3. CONTACTED YAMAHA SINCE BIKE WAS 6 MONTHS OUT OF WARRANTY. THEY SAID THEY WOULD REPLACE THE SWITCH AND I HAD TO PAY FOR THE LABOR TO REPLACE OLD SWITCH. EVEN THOUGH THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM WITH THE SWITCHES ON THE VENTURES... *TR
